31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Abu Qilabah through a different chain of narrators on the authority of 'Imran b. Husain to the same effect. But in this version he did not mention "He spoke severely of them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ أَعْتَقَ عَبِيدًا لَهُ لَمْ يَبْلُغْهُمُ الثُّلُثُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Manumits Slaves Of His That Exceed One Third Of His Property
